Package dkeep.logic

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MovementStrategy
    This interface represents a movement strategy for a character.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Character
    This class has basic information about the in-game characters such as the hero, guards and ogres.
    DrunkenMovement
    Implements the movement strategy of a drunken guard.
    Game
    This class has information about the game, most importantly its level.
    Guard
    Guard extends the Character class and implements a few of its abstract methods.
    GuardLevel
    This class is a Level whose enemies are guards.
    Hero
    Hero extends the Character class and implements a few of its abstract methods
    Level
    This class has information about a game's level, such as their table and worktable, the hero, enemies and position of the key.
    Ogre
    Ogre extends the Character class and implements a few of its abstract methods.
    OgreLevel
    This class is a Level whose enemies are ogres.
    OgreMovement
    Implements the movement strategy of an ogre.
    RookieMovement
    Implements the movement strategy of a rookie guard.
    SuspiciousMovement
    Implements the movement strategy of a suspicious guard.
